text:
insidesoci.al

Seattle Full Time

We are solving the mystery of on-site social ROI.

We are a seed funded company and making our first (and second!) hire. We are looking for awesome software engineers and don't care what you are good at as long as you are REALLY good at it. We will compensate with significant equity (first hire remember) and salary.

We are currently javascript/node/redis/aws, but are far more interested in talent than experience in our technologies.

drop a line and lets see if it is a fit! info@insidesoci.al
